title: Startup Mantra: Gearing up to spark retrofit tech - Hindustan Times
content: Startup Mantra: Gearing up to spark retrofit tech  Hindustan Times
description: Founded by Sahil Uttekar, Piyush Sharma and Mohit Narula, ‘Electrun Motors’ (Incessant Motors Private Limited) is providing a sustainable and tech-based solution to the automotive industry
